channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report X-2024080905
item.description:
Report X-2024080905

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-12
  • City: SACO
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1 gallon adhesive in plastic bag placed in a used box stuffed full of plastic. paint clips pooped and adhesive leaked into bag. the smell was the give away that it had leaked. no visible damage shown on box
